name: Serious Breakdown
description:
Once at the base of the opponents, the main character received a serious breakdown. A robot of a new generation is forced to get rid of all opponents in its path, along the way collecting spare parts at each level in order to pass to the next.

Serious Breakdown is a platformer, in the role of a robot, you need to clean up the levels as much as possible and get the necessary parts. Learn to dodge or kill enemies. At the end of the path, you will need to defeat the main villain of this universe.

Features of the game:
- Hardcore
- Beautiful Pixel Art
- Musical accompaniment
- Boss
